thread.title: Paul Costa Rau
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Paul Costa Rau

author: Paul Costa Rau
title: Paul Costa Rau
text:
This is the second time I used their service. First time it all went like a dream and I was very happy. Left a five star review too.
This time I booked my partner's car. She was waiting at home and nobody showed. They didn't call either.
I used the 0800 number 5 times and couldn't get through to a human. Logged the issue via email and they are looking until it.
Anyway, its 18h15 and the day is gone. Won't be using them again. They just lost 2 customers...
